page.title: 19Amenities
page.content: In our actual survey area there are absolutely no ammenities except the ones to be found at{Atherfield Holiday {Camp.}Shops,Churches and Garages are to be found at{Chale approx 2 miles {away.}Banks,Library and Chemist are at {Niton approx 5 miles away.}Leisure Centres and Supermarkets are 8-15 miles away at{Newport and Ryde.}A survey we carried out indicated that for small amounts of shopping people bought from{The Spar Shops at Chale, {Chale Green or Shorwell}the first two also having a{Post-Office.}Weekly or in a few cases twice weekly shopping trips were made to either Gateways or International Supermarkets in Newport, Ventnor,Freshwater or to Tesco's Supermarket near Ryde.Transport for these trips was by car.It was noted that Boots,the Chemist,especially the branch at Newport was often visited.
